Headline: Forest Park- bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park- bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at California. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park- bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at California. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
